text:
@FLOTUS @USNavy Melania, if YOU had Jesus’ supposed super-powers, would YOU have given us the coronavirus cure already?
If you answer “yes”, then you’re so awesome that you’re more loving than even someone as loving as Jesus. Believe in yourself enough to answer “yes”!

#coronavirus
#pray
